name: best franchise ever yo!
reviewBody: i like this franchise but this version is the best yo!its got todays biggest stars entering the twilight zone plus it has a cool host and cool theme song they should make a 2nd season of this yo!i watch it on wb on Saturday and i watch the original version with Rod Serling whenever i can onscience-fiction channel and it rocks yo!UPN shouldn't of canceled it yo!upn should renew it homies!my first episode was eye of the beholder cause it was true to the original yo!my favorite episode of the original was time enough at last because it was funny (especialy the end)yo!i wish i had UPN when this show aired but sadly i did not=( yo!
